summary.purpose: Root barrel export file that re-exports all public sub-modules (helpers, managers, middlewares, types) as named namespaces.
summary.problem_solved: Provides a single entry point for consumers of the library, allowing them to import any functionality from one location rather than from individual sub-module paths.

exports.name: helpers
exports.description_one_line: Namespace re-export of all helper utilities (firebase, email, notifications, etc.)

exports.name: managers
exports.description_one_line: Namespace re-export of all manager singletons (cache, logger, translation)

exports.name: middlewares
exports.description_one_line: Namespace re-export of all Express middlewares (auth, error handling, validation)

exports.name: types
exports.description_one_line: Namespace re-export of all shared TypeScript types, interfaces, and enums

symbols.name: helpers
symbols.description_one_line: Aggregated namespace of all helper utilities exported from src/helpers/index.ts

details.what_it_does: Groups all helper functions (Firebase CRUD, email sending, SMS, notifications, time utilities, board helpers, location helpers, login helpers, phone number utilities, task helpers, Redis helpers, and server start utilities) under a single 'helpers' namespace object.

symbols.name: managers
symbols.description_one_line: Aggregated namespace of all manager singletons exported from src/managers/index.ts

details.what_it_does: Groups CacheManager, LoggerManager, and TranslationManager singletons under a single 'managers' namespace object.

symbols.name: middlewares
symbols.description_one_line: Aggregated namespace of all Express middlewares exported from src/middlewares/index.ts

details.what_it_does: Groups auth middlewares (verify_user_auth, nx_user_login, client_login), validation middlewares (mandatory, optional), request logger, trim body middleware, and error handler under a single 'middlewares' namespace object.

symbols.name: types
symbols.description_one_line: Aggregated namespace of all shared TypeScript types, interfaces, and enums exported from src/types/index.ts

details.what_it_does: Groups all shared type definitions (Firebase query types, snapshot types, Express handler types, email interfaces, enums like SimProvider) under a single 'types' namespace object.
